WcsService
service in module npn-viz-tool

Description

Interacts with the NPN geoserver WCS instance to supply underlying gridded data. Loading of this service extends the protypes of Number and the google.maps.LatLng class.

Important: There should be no need to import and interact with this service directly. Indivdual layers (npn-viz-tool.vis-map-services:WmsMapLayer#methods_getgriddeddata) expose an instance based method for fetching gridded data specific to those layers which should be used instead (they call through to this service).

Methods

  • getGriddedData(geoServerUrl, activeLayer, latLng, gridSize)

    Fetch gridded data for a specific location on a specific map layer.

    Parameters
    ParamTypeDetails
    geoServerUrlstring

    The base URL of the geoserver instance.

    activeLayerobject

    The map layer returned from the WcsService that the data to fetch is associated with.

    latLnggoogle.maps.LatLng

    The point under which to fetch the data for.

    gridSizenumber

    The side of the grid to ask the WCS service data for (the larger the gridSize the more data).

    Returns
    promise

    A promise that will be resolved with an array of numbers, or rejected.
